mapper.select: select pbt.prd_board_id, pbt.discount_rate, pbt.price, pbt.title, pbt.content, pbt.score, pbt.category, pbt.brand, pt.PRD_ID,pt.prd_nm,pt.prd_detail,pt.option1,pt.option2, ft.UPLOAD_PATH from prd_board_t pbt LEFT JOIN PRD_T pt on(pbt.PRD_BOARD_ID=pt.PRD_BOARD_ID) LEFT JOIN FILE_T ft on(pbt.PRD_BOARD_ID =ft.ARTICLE_ID) WHERE pbt.prd_board_id=#{prd_board_id} and ft.board_flag='prd' order by prd_board_id
